MessageProcessor
public class MessageProcessorChain
extends Object
implements MessageProcessor

Constructs a chain of MessageProcessors to run in sequence.

Constructor Detail

MessageProcessorChain

public MessageProcessorChain(ChainableMessageProcessor[] processors)
Constructs a MessageProcesorChain given an array of ChainableMessageProcessor objects. Processors will be executed in the order that they appear in the Array. If a given processor object appears in the array multiple times, it will be executed multiple times.

Parameters:
processors - A ChainableMessageProcessor. Processors are executed in the order they appear.
Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0
